title: .then()
description: The `.then()` JS method adds fulfillment handlers to the `Promise` object and can optionally include rejection handlers.
content: The method used with promises to specify what to do when a promise resolves successfully. It takes a callback function that handles the resolved value of the promise and can optionally take a second callback function to handle rejection, though `.catch()` is commonly used for this purpose. It returns a new `Promise` object for chaining further actions.
